pageContent: Aims: To assess long-term outcomes and resource use of 4D Brachytherapy, a one-stage real-time implant for the treatment of prostate cancer that uses stranded and loose iodine-125 seeds, and to compare with the conventional two-stage (2S) technique.

metaData.source:
Detection of clinical unilateral T3a prostate cancer - by digital rectal examination or transrectal ultrasonography?
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16945120/
